fields.headline: Champ man tops the table
fields.bodyText: The fourth incarnation of Championship Manager has hit the top of the sales chart in the UK after only a few days, according to Eidos. We've got a very entertaining piece about it in this week's Online, out on Thursday, written by Guardian football writer Paul MacInnes. He, like me, has an addiction to the game. Luckily for me, the Mac version isn't out just yet (a week or two to go) which allows work and social lives to continue uninterrupted, for now...
